Name: The Grand Hall
Description: An elegant, high-ceiling ballroom perfect for weddings, debuts, and corporate galas.

Name: Sunset Resort
Description: A relaxing outdoor oasis with a private pool. Ideal for family outings, team buildings, and casual birthdays.

Name: The Executive Suite
Description: A professional, sound-proofed environment designed for board meetings, workshops, and brainstorming sessions.

Name: The Secret Garden
Description: A small, intimate botanical setting. Perfect for romantic proposals, photoshoots, or tea parties.

Description: A modern rooftop venue with stunning city views. Great for cocktail parties and evening socials.
